title: The one thing that's disappointing about Aatrox in his animations
body:
http://pm1.narvii.com/5868/ae3ae0784d3b5137de317be7c35d11f5fdd4aff3_hq.jpg
He doesn't punch people with his right arm! It's a giant armoured hand made for slugging someone in the jaw, but he never uses it in combat. Seriously, I really want to be able to punch people as Aatrox.

replies.body: He's mean to be an artist in battle, punching people when he has a sword it's not in his style, or atleast that's how i see it.

Actually, it's a gauntlet used to shield blows. If a stray blow happens to come at Aatrox, he can merely angle his blade to parry it, and his leading arm will be protected by his gauntlet arm.
RIP in peace Garen punch...

"one thing"

rofl his entire design is trash

his entire creation is a pathethic joke
he punches the air while holding a sword in that same hand

I think his armored hand is better suited for grabbing an enemies weapon before stabbing them in the heart.

It's why he uses his sword in the right hand.

That's just my interpretation.
Aatrox is left handed?
He uses it for his thrid sword strike doesn't he?

He Thrusts his sword into an enemy, gutting them and ripping their insides out with a serrated blade, or brings the blade down- empowered by his own blood- on top of his enemies, effectively cleaving them in two.

And his lore.  And his aesthetics.  And his lackluster VO.  And his bland kit.  And his generic and boring playstyle.  And how badly he fell from the cool "Inspires men to furious bloodlust" theme his lore suggested about him into a generic splitpush bruiser with NO teamplay skills.  And his goofy design.  And...

You get the point.  It think Aatrox was is the single biggest pile of "meh" Riot has ever produced.
